description: This file defines a Room database class for an Android game app, including entities and DAOs for game progress, achievements, and rewards. It implements a singleton pattern to provide a single instance of the database.

classes.name: GameDatabase
classes.description: An abstract class extending RoomDatabase that provides DAOs for game data entities and manages the singleton instance.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Provides the singleton instance of GameDatabase, creating it if necessary, using the application context.
